CommandTree

One sidebar.
Every task.

CommandTree discovers all runnable tasks in your VS Code workspace and puts them in a single, beautiful tree view. Shell scripts, npm, Makefiles, launch configs — all in one place.

Install for VS Code Read the Docs
$ ext install nimblesite.commandtree

Everything you need

Stop hunting for scripts. CommandTree finds them all and gives you one-click access.

🔍

Auto-Discovery

Recursively scans your workspace for shell scripts, npm scripts, Makefile targets, VS Code tasks, launch configs, and Python scripts.

⭐

Quick Tasks

Pin your most-used tasks to a dedicated panel at the top. One click to run your favorites.

🏷️

Tagging

Group related tasks with custom tags. Use pattern matching to auto-tag by type, name, or path.

🔎

Filtering

Instantly filter the tree by text search or by tag. Find exactly what you need.

▶️

Run Anywhere

Execute in a new terminal, the current terminal, or launch with the VS Code debugger.

📁

Folder Grouping

Tasks grouped by directory with a collapsible nested hierarchy. Monorepo-friendly.

Discovers every task type

No configuration needed. Just install and go.

🐚

Shell Scripts

.sh, .bash, .zsh

📦

NPM Scripts

package.json

⚙️

Makefile Targets

Makefile / makefile

🛠️

VS Code Tasks

.vscode/tasks.json

🐛

Launch Configs

.vscode/launch.json

🐍

Python Scripts

.py files

Ready to tame your tasks?

Install CommandTree and see every runnable task in your workspace instantly.
